data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3497418,"name":"Frank","username":"AlligatorFan3","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/f17d59/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-31T02:43:05.413Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eIs there a way to have pathplanner flip or mirror a path across an axis? (Similar to how being on red alliance last year would mirror the path). Right now pathplanner is flipped, so It moves straight correctly, but it turns and strafes the wrong way. Last year our solution was to tell pathplanner to run a red side auto when we were on blue alliance, vice versa. However, it does not work this year likely because the field is not mirrored this year.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eI have tried fixing this issue by adjusting numerous things (changing module locations, flipping encoder directions, etc), but changing one thing breaks something else, so at this point if we can flip it how we did last year this would work as a solution for
